title: Writing for real
creator_credit: Ivan Gaal, Victoria. Ministry of Education and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Documentary about the way in which a group of Year 10 students work with a local facility for elderly people to develop their understanding of the workplace, exploring their relationships between people and the workplace and apply school-based learning to a practical suggestion.
